trans-unit.source: Enables you to pass context properties from the COM Transaction Integrator (COMTI) into the COM+ context.
trans-unit.target: 使用此选项可将上下文属性从 COM 事务系统集成商 (COMTI) 传递到 COM + 上下文。

trans-unit.source: COMTI provides services for accessing the IBM Customer Information Control System (CICS) and IBM Information Management System (IMS).
trans-unit.target: COMTI 提供用于访问 IBM 客户信息控制系统 (CICS) 和 IBM 信息管理系统 (IM) 的服务。

trans-unit.source: Essentially, COMTI provides a set of tools and services that ease the task of wrapping mainframe transactions and business logic as COM components.
trans-unit.target: 从根本上来说，COMTI 提供了一套工具和简化为 COM 组件包装大型机事务和业务逻辑的任务的服务。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute"></xref> class, setting the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute.Value*> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute"></xref>类，设置<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute.Value*>属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute"></xref> class, enabling the setting of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute.Value*> property.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute"></xref>类，并启用的设置<xref:System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute.Value*>属性。</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.COMTIIntrinsicsAttribute.Value*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the COMTI context properties are passed into the COM+ context; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>COMTI 上下文属性传递到 COM + 上下文; 如果否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the COM Transaction Integrator (COMTI) context properties are passed into the COM+ context.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否将 COM 事务系统集成商 (COMTI) 上下文属性传递到 COM + 上下文。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the COMTI context properties are passed into the COM+ context; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>COMTI 上下文属性传递到 COM + 上下文; 如果否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。
